headline: Weekly Stock Grader Analysis: Upgrades & Downgrades on Top Blue-Chip Stocks
summary: During these busy times, it pays to stay on top of the latest profit opportunities. And today’s blog post should be a great place to start. After taking a close look at the latest data on institutional buying pressure and each company’s fundamental health, I decided to revise my Stock Grader recommendations for 93 big blue chips. Chances are that you have at least one of these stocks in your portfolio, so you may want to give this list a skim and act accordingly. This Week’s Ratings Changes: Upg

headline: Howmet Aerospace (HWM): Evaluating Valuation After Outperforming Earnings and Revenue Expectations
summary: Howmet Aerospace (HWM) just delivered a quarterly earnings report that grabbed investors’ attention, beating expectations on both earnings and revenue. The company pointed to strong demand in the commercial aerospace and defense markets, and it is hinting at even better days ahead thanks to anticipated higher defense spending. If you are on the fence about holding or buying, these results might give you pause for thought about Howmet’s next chapter. This positive news builds on a momentum...

headline: 2 Surging  Stocks on Our Buy List and 1 Facing Challenges
